sourcesContent:
import axios from 'axios'; import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' function PanelMovie({ id, backgroundImage, posterImage }) { const infoID = id; const [infoMovie, setInfoMovie] = useState([]); useEffect(()=>{ axios .get(`http://localhost:8081/movie-id?id=${infoID}`) .then((res)=>{ setInfoMovie(res.data) }) .catch((err)=>console.error(err)) },[infoID]) const navigate = useNavigate(); const viewMoreInformation = (id_movie) =>{ navigate(`/movie/${id_movie}`, { state: {id_movie} }); } return ( <>

{infoMovie[0]?.title}

{infoMovie[0]?.release_year ? new Date(infoMovie[0].release_year).toISOString().slice(0, 10) : ""}

{infoMovie[0]?.description}

Géneros
ACCION AVENTURA FICCIÓN
Compañias de producción
Warret Bros Pictures Legendary Pictures Legensdsd
) } export default PanelMovie
